formalpara.title: Figure 7. uv1 specification
formalpara.para: The vulF cell expresses LIN-3 and signals the presumptive uv1 cells via LET-23 and LET-60. egl-38 is expressed in vulF and is necessary for lin-3 expression in the same cell (Chang et al., 1999; Rajakumar and Chamberlin, 2007). Activated LET-23 bypasses this requirement for EGL-38 function.
